history.proof: intros. unfold div. destruct (div_full q p) as [n' [r' [H5 H6]]]. rewrite H5. qsimpl. hecrush use: Nat.div_mod_unique, Nat.lt_succ_pred, Nat.mul_comm.

exceptions.tactic: intros p n q r H1 H2.
intros p' n q r H1 H2.
intros p' n' q r H1 H2.
intros p' n' q' r H1 H2.
intros p' n' q' r' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment q, p, n, r : nat H : q = n * p + r H0 : r < p n', r' : nat H5 : q = n' * p + r' H6 : p <> 0 -> r' < p Unable to unify "?M1431 = ?M1429 / p" with "projT1 (existT (fun n : nat => {r : nat | n' * p + r' = n * p + r /\\ (p <> 0 -> r < p)}) n' (exist (fun r : nat => n' * p + r' = n' * p + r /\\ (p <> 0 -> r < p)) r' (conj eq_refl H6))) = n".
The reference H7 was not found in the current environment.
In environment p, n, r : nat H0 : r < p n', r' : nat H5 : n * p + r = n' * p + r' H6 : (p = 0 -> False) -> r' < p Unable to unify "r' < p" with "n' = n".
The reference H4 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros p n q r H1 H2. intros H3 H4. unfold div. destruct (div_full q p) as [n' [r' [H5 H6]]]. rewrite H5. intros H7. apply Nat.div_unique with (r := r') (b := p). - apply H7. - apply H6. apply H4.
